name: Bad Egg (Cameron Thomas)
description:
Based off the cliché "A Bad Egg", this project is my submission for Game Off 2022. Smash some eggs and get some gooey softbody fun.

Send me a screenshot at cameron.w.thomas@gmail.com if you win!

Also send me an email if you have any issues or bugs to report.

Source Code: https://github.com/CameronWThomas/A-Bad-Egg
